prompt: Who was the oldest justice on the US supreme court in 1980?
response: In 1980, the oldest justice on the United States Supreme Court was Justice William O. Douglas. He was born on October 16, 1898, and served on the Supreme Court from 1939 until his retirement in 1975. Therefore, in 1980, Justice Douglas was still alive and would have been the oldest serving justice on the Court at that time.
